title: Bug - Can't Change Runes, Screen Doesn't Pop up even after hitting the edit icon
body:
2 games in a row (and now a dodge timer) i couldn't change my runes in ARAM, i'd click edit, and get only the "X" part of the popup.

Summs were changeable, Rune Pages weren't

Came up with an error "Couldn't edit rune page"

Fix thanks
